mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHMENTS (attachment_id, type, type_id, idx, ofile_name, sfile_name, uploaded_date) VALUES('ATTA'||LPAD(SEQ_ATTA_ID.NEXTVAL, 10, '0') , #{type}, #{type_id}, #{idx}, #{ofile_name}, #{sfile_name}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select * from attachments where type = #{type} and type_id = #{type_id}
mapper.delete: delete attachments where type=#{type} and type_id=#{type_id}
